title: Indifi Technologies appoints Jasmeet Arora as chief growth officer
description: “Jasmeet brings vast experience that will play a crucial role in enhancing Indifi's market presence and fostering impactful financial inclusion. We look forward to achieving new milestones under his leadership and unlocking fresh avenues for growth,” said Sangram Singh, CEO at Indifi Technologies.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
